snippet: KAUFMAN--Robert. Florence, Ronna, Cathy, Julie - how lucky you are to be loved by him. We will miss his sweetness and his smile. Always. Peggy Half Silbert & Nancy Half Carter and our family 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAUFMAN--Robert. Florence, Ronna, Cathy, Julie - how lucky you are to be loved by him. We will miss his sweetness and his smile. Always. Peggy Half Silbert & Nancy Half Carter and our family 1/3
